contenttemplated:
[{"type":"text/html","content":"

Joining Kai to talk about the week's business and economic news are Leigh Gallagher of Fortune and the Wall Street Journal's John Carney. The big topics this week: May's strong jobs report, the possibility of a raise in rates by the Federal Reserve and Greece's relationship with the eurozone. 

"}]
title: Weekly Wrap: Jobs report, Federal Reserve and Grexit
description: John Carney and Leigh Gallagher join Kai Ryssdal to recap the week in business and finance.
teaser: John Carney and Leigh Gallagher join Kai Ryssdal to recap the week in business and finance.
contentencoded: Joining Kai to talk about the week's business and economic news are Leigh Gallagher of Fortune and the Wall Street Journal's John Carney. The big topics this week: May's strong jobs report, the possibility of a raise in rates by the Federal Reserve and Greece's relationship with the eurozone.
